Entries.dating_Robin_memory_oneday: It’s funny. I used to picture you and me, but I see now that you and Mom are a perfect match.
Entries.married_Robin: So now I have another stepdad, huh? That's going to take some getting used to.^So now I have a stepmom and a stepdad, huh? That's going to take some getting used to.

Changes.LogName: Sebastian dialog updates - Robin & Demetrius drifting apart

Entries.Thu2: Demetrius has been working a lot lately, but I guess it just means more quiet around here.
Entries.Sat4: I've noticed Demetrius's been putting in some crazy hours lately. I guess he's trying to get ahead.
Entries.Fri6: Mom's been asking if I've seen Demetrius. As if I leave the basement enough to notice.
Entries.Fri8: Demetrius has been putting in a lot of long hours. Mom seems to care, but I barely notice.
Entries.Sat8: Demetrius used to bug me about getting out of my room more. Now he's working all the time himself.
Entries.Thu10: Mom seems frustrated about Demetrius working so much, but honestly, it just feels like things are quieter now.
Entries.Sat10: You know, I actually had a conversation with Demetrius last week. Feels like a rare achievement these days.

Changes.LogName: Sebastian dialog updates - Robin & Demetrius split

Entries.dating_Robin_memory_oneday: It’s funny. I used to picture you and me, but I see now that you and Mom are a perfect match.
Entries.married_Robin: So now I have another stepdad, huh? That's going to take some getting used to.^So now I have a stepmom and a stepdad, huh? That's going to take some getting used to.
Entries.Thu2: Mom moving into Maru's room didn't change much for me. I'm still doing my own thing.
Entries.Sat4: Mom and Demetrius finally separated. I guess this was inevitable.
Entries.Fri6: So... Mom & Demetrius separated. Plot twist: they're both still in the house. Mom's in Maru's room, Demetrius is still here, and I'm in my basement, pretending this is all totally normal.
Entries.Fri8: So, Mom's bunking in Maru's room now. Guess the family tree's getting a pruning.
Entries.Sat8: The whole thing with Mom and Demetrius splitting feels awkward, but as long as they leave me alone, I'm good.
Entries.Thu10: So, Mom moved into Maru's room. It's like we're all here but not really together, you know?
Entries.Sat10: Mom's staying in Maru's room now... Kind of weird, but I just stay out of the way.
